channel.title: Build.xml
channel.description:
So im still trying to figure out how to use build.xml. Currently i am right clicking it and doing run as ant build
BUT i get this [code]com.sun.tools.javac.Main is not on the classpath. Perhaps JAVA_HOME does not point to the JDK. It is currently set to "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6"
Total time: 908 milliseconds [/code]
in the bottom box
how do i edit the path for the JDK

item.title: Build.xml
item.dc:creator: @devenb123 devenb123
item.description:
@devenb123 wrote:

So im still trying to figure out how to use build.xml.
Currently i am right clicking it and doing run as ant build

BUT i get this

[code]com.sun.tools.javac.Main is not on the classpath.
Perhaps JAVA_HOME does not point to the JDK.
It is currently set to “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6”

Total time: 908 milliseconds
[/code]

in the bottom box

how do i edit the path for the JDK

Read full topic
